info.name: Dishonored - Google Theme
info.description: Want a dark theme with some customizable settings? Check out my theme: Google Search +
info.additionalInfo: V3.2 (November 3rd, 2018): ► Fixed search bar while scrolling down. ► Fixed border colours around elements. ► Fixed links being white. ► Fixed colour of visited links. V3.1 (November 20th, 2018): ► Fixed search bar for new update. V3.0 (February 15th, 2018): ► Fixed Google Apps dropdown menu. ► Fixed other areas that were not themed.
